related_post.text: Shouldn\'t that work?```gofunc doit(w http.ResponseWriter r http.Request) { http.ServeFile(w r /uploads")}func Run(serverconf utils.Config orm orm.ORM) { r := chi.NewRouter() r.Use(middleware.Logger) r.Get("/ func(w http.ResponseWriter r http.Request) { w.Write([]byte("ok")) }) r.Get("/uploads doit) // Inform the user where the server is listening logger.Info("Running @  + serverconf.ListenEndpoint()) // Print out and exit(1) to the OS if the server cannot run logger.Fatal(http.ListenAndServe(serverconf.ListenEndpoint() r))}```

comments: Dallet has question and Iam (after a LOT of conversation) provides an SO post which helps
